name: duo-cron-job
description: Node cron job service for ESS User Office project.

scripts.dev: env NODE_ENV=development env API_URL=http://localhost:4000/graphql node index.js
scripts.debug: env NODE_ENV=development env API_URL=http://localhost:4000/graphql node  --inspect index.js
scripts.prod: env NODE_ENV=production env API_URL=http://backend:4000/graphql node index.js
scripts.test: env NODE_ENV=test env API_URL=http://localhost:4000/graphql env API_AUTH_TOKEN=testtoken jest --coverage

author: SWAP
